channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Muhammad Rehan Siddiqui
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Muhammad Rehan Siddiqui

item.title: Project 1: Data Science Heart Disease Predictor
item.description: Created a tool that estimates heart disease patients to help people suffering from heart disease. Dataset for training ML model was collected from Kaggle Feature Engineering to select the best features for model training. Used Logistic Regression for classification of heart disease. Built a client facing API using flask Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project 2: AI Blueprint Suggester
item.description: Created a tool that estimates your Property/Land width and dimensions and suggests a Blueprint according to your choice. Dataset for training Deep Learning model was collected from UCMerced_LandUse and Google Images Feature Engineering to select the best features for model training. Model was trained on Google Colaboratory Used OpenCV,YoloV3 for Object Detection. Built a client facing API using flask Deployed Flask API to Cloud
